name: CATastrophy
description:
Synopsis:

You're on a dying space station, and you have to escape. One problem: no gravity. One solution: throw cats to give you equal and opposite thrust to make it out.

How to Play:

Number keys 1, 2, 3 select cat types to throw.

Left Mouse launches cat.

Cat #1 launches straight and vertical with small boost.

Cat #2 launches straight and vertical with large boost.

Cat #3 launches more at a turn with moderate boost.

Developers:

James Vinson

Jorge Rodriguez

William Funk
